thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kratos Defense And Security Q4 Revenue $202.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kratos Defense And Security Q4 Revenue $202.2 Mln
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Kratos Defense And Security Solutions Inc :
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.21 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $202.2 MILLION * Q1 FINANCIAL GUIDANCE FOR REVENUES EXCLUDING PSS BUSINESS IS $140 TO $150 MILLION​
* ‍SIGNED A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO DIVEST ITS PSS BUSINESS FOR NET CASH PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY $70 MILLION​
* SEES ‍Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $9 TO $11 MILLION​ * ‍FORECASTING 2018 POSITIVE CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS OF $35 TO $45 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
